front.title: Service Discovery Usage for REsource LOcation And Discovery (RELOAD)

abstract.t: REsource LOcation and Discovery (RELOAD) does not define a generic service discovery mechanism as a part of the base protocol. This document defines how the Recursive Distributed Rendezvous (ReDiR) service discovery mechanism used in OpenDHT can be applied to RELOAD overlays to provide a generic service discovery mechanism.
